error.report: Refreshing your browser may resolve the issue. If not, please copy the expanded error message here and send it to your support team or
error.title: Unfortunately it appears an error has occurred...

bundle.name: Network bundle name
bundle.explanation: Network bundles are a collection of OpenStreetMap data and one or more GTFS feeds that make up the transit layer of a baseline network.
bundle.failure: Error processing. Please upload valid OSM .pbf and GTFS .zip files.
bundle.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you would like to delete this network bundle? Projects using this network bundle will no longer work.
bundle.deleteDisabled: This network bundle cannot be deleted while projects are using it. Currently used by %(projects) project(s).
bundle.notice: After clicking "Create" you will need to wait a few minutes for new OSM and GTFS feeds to be processed.
bundle.createDescription: A Network Bundle requires both GTFS and OSM data. When creating a new Network Bundle you have the option of reusing data from previously created Network Bundles within this region.

osm.existingLabel: Select existing Network Bundle to reuse OSM from.

bundle.osmosisCommand: osmosis --read-pbf file.pbf --bounding-box left=%(west) bottom=%(south) right=%(east) top=%(north) --tf accept-ways highway=* public_transport=platform railway=platform park_ride=* --tf accept-relations type=restriction --used-node --write-pbf file-cropped.pbf

gtfs.existingLabel: Select existing Network Bundle to reuse GTFS from.
gtfs.uploadNewLabel: Select one or more .zip files containing valid GTFS

nav.unfinishedRequests: You have unfinished requests. Are you sure you want to exit?

phasing.disabled: Phasing is disabled when a modification is bidirectional or a timetable uses exact times.
phasing.headwayMismatchWarning: Warning! The selected timetable's %(selectedTimetableHeadway) minute headway does not equal this timetable's headway, which could cause unintended behavior.
phasing.noAvailableStopsWarning: The selected timetable does not contain stops available to phase from!
phasing.exactTimesWarning: Exact times is not available because phasing is enabled on this timetable.

r5Version.analysisVersionDifferent: You have run regional analyses with a different routing engine version. If you want to compare scenarios, consider re-running them with the same version.
r5Version.comparisonIsDifferent: WARNING! The analyses you are comparing ran on different routing engines. Changes in accessibility may be due to differences in the routing engines, rather than the transport scenarios.
r5Version.latestReleaseVersionNotSelected: An updated version of the routing engine is available. Changing versions should improve performance but may change analysis results.
r5Version.title: Routing engine
r5Version.customVersionWarning: Use custom version %(version): (must be a supported Conveyal routing engine version)

region.name: Region Name
region.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you would like to delete this region? This will delete all associated projects and modifications.
region.boundsNotice: Bounds are snapped to points on our regular grid.

project.createActionTooltip: Each project requires a name and an associated network bundle. Once a project is created, its associated bundle cannot be changed.
project.name: Project name
project.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you would like to delete this project?
project.noBundles: To get started with projects in this region, first create a network bundle.
project.goToExisting: or go to an existing project

variant.description: A Scenario is a collection of modifications within a project.
variant.name: Scenario
variant.showModifications: Show modifications for this scenario on the map
variant.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this scenario? Proceeding will clear references to it from all modifications.
variant.export: Select a scenario to download or share
variant.exportExplanation: Generate a JSON representation of a scenario, GeoJSON to map new features in GIS, or a printable summary of the scenario.

transitEditor.bidirectionalWarning: Modification cannot be bidirectional because timetables in this modification have phasing information.
transitEditor.fromStopLabel: Start of reroute/extension (existing stop on pattern)
transitEditor.toStopLabel: End of reroute/extension (existing stop on pattern)
transitEditor.instructions: Click the map to add a new stop in a fixed location. Click an existing segment to add a stop to it. Click on a stop to delete it or change it into a control point, which helps define the alignment. Click an auto-created stop to fix its location.
transitEditor.snappedStopDescription: New stop snapped to existing stop

shapefile.invalidMultiLineString: MultiLineString feature in input shapefile has disjoint segments, cannot process.
shapefile.invalidShapefileType: Shapefile type must be LineString or MultiLineString

modification.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you would like to delete this modification? All external references (example: phasing) to this modification will also be cleared.
modification.clearBundleInfo: If you deleted the network bundle underlying this modification, you will need to clear the bundle or delete this modification.
modification.importFromProjectInfo: When importing from a project associated with a different bundle, only "Add Trips" modifications will be copied. If a modification uses an existing stop from the baseline GTFS, it will be replaced in the imported modification by a new stop at the same location.
modification.name: Modification name
modification.onlyOneRoute: Only one route will be shown on the map at a time, even if multiple routes are selected below.

copyTimetable.noSegments: The modification being copied to and/or from does not have any segments. The default segment speed of %(segmentSpeed) km/h will be used.
copyTimetable.curHasMoreSegments: The modification of the timetable you are copying from has less segments than the modification you are copying to. The segment speeds will be copied %(numSegments) segment(s) and after that, the default segment speed of %(segmentSpeed) km/h will be used.
copyTimetable.curHasLessSegments: The modification of the timetable you are copying to has less segments than the modification you are copying from. The segment speeds will be copied %(numSegments) segment(s).

modification.selectStopInstructions: Click 'New', then draw a polygon around the stops you wish to select.
modification.dwellTimeDescription: The default time table dwell time will be used for each stop that does not have a custom one set.

addedSegments.confirmSpeedChange: Setting the average speed will affect speeds for all added segments. Do you wish to continue?
addedSegments.confirmTimeChange: Setting the total travel time will affect speeds for all added segments. Do you wish to continue?

spatialDatasets.confirmLODES: LEHD LODES data are only available for the United States.  Are you sure you want to fetch these data?
spatialDatasets.name: layer name
spatialDatasets.confirmDelete: Are you sure you would like to delete this layer?
spatialDatasets.confirmDeleteSource: Are you sure you would like to delete all layers from this dataset?

analysis.createGridTooltip: Upload a .csv (with lat, lon, and at least one additional numeric column), a .grid file, or the files making up a shapefile (unzipped .shp .shx .dbf and .prj).
analysis.warningsInProject: Warnings were found applying the project
analysis.disableRegionalAnalysis: Fetch results for a single point before running a regional analysis
analysis.comparisonAccessToInstantaneous: compared with %(opportunity) within %(cutoff) minutes (average instantaneous accessibility)
analysis.bundleOutOfDate: Selected date %(selectedDate) is out of service for project %(project). Its bundle %(bundle) only has service between %(serviceStart) and %(serviceEnd). There may also be days in between without service. Please be certain of your GTFS service dates and select an appropriate one.

status.updated: Ready to fetch results with updated settings

fetchStatus.INITIALIZING_CLUSTER: Initializing compute cluster (may take several minutes)

analysis.separateFeatures: A separate aggregation area will be created for each feature (up to 100) in the uploaded shapefile.
analysis.attributeName: Shapefile attribute to use as aggregation area name
analysis.weightedAverageAccessibilityWarning: Weighted average accessibility may not be representative of the experience of users of the system; we recommend using the histogram and percentile measures above.
analysis.disableFetch: Select a project before fetching results

customizeRequest.label: Customize Analysis Request
customizeRequest.description: For advanced users only. Notice that "percentiles" cannot be changed here.
customizeRequest.error: Not saved due to invalid JSON.

report.keepTripsOutside: Existing trips outside modified windows are kept.

adjustSpeed.noHopsInstructions: Speed adjustment will apply to entire pattern(s). Use button below to limit the adjustment to certain segments.
adjustSpeed.selectInstructions: Speed adjustment will apply only to selected segments.

resources.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure? You cannot undo this action later.
resources.title: Resources
